calendar.event: [strong]First Class Meeting[/strong]
Close reading of Gleick [em]Preface[/em]
[a href='Assignment_01.xhtml'] Assignment 1: The Setup essay[/a] due.
Read: [em]Gleick[/em] Preface. What didn’t you understand?
[a href='Assignment_02.xhtml'] Assignment 2: Positional Numbers[/a] due.
[a href='Assignment_03.xhtml'] Assignment 3: Binary Numbers and the Trick Die[/a] due.[br/]Finish the Preface of the Gleick book, and read Chapter 1.
Binary information encoding: binary search. Encoding audio information.

[a href='Assignment_04.xhtml']Assignment 4: Audio Encoding[/a] due. [br/]Read Chapter 2 of the Gleick book [br/]Visit the [a href='http://teagueduino.org']Teagueduino Web Site[/a], and be prepared to discuss what Teagueduino is.
Character codes and units of measure continued. [br/]Teagueduino Inputs and Outputs
ASCII, ISO-Latin-1, and Unicode character codes.
Teagueduino output modes continued; Teagueduino programming. [br/][a href='2012-10-04_sleep_data.html']Sleep Data[/a]
[a href='Assignment_05.xhtml']Assignment 5: Codes[/a] due. [br/]Read Chapters 3-4 of the Gleick book
Bits and bytes; K, M, and G unit of measure prefixes; more on Teagueduino output modes.
Review for midterm exam.
Exam [em]post mortem[/em]. How to solder.
Teagueduino soldering party. Access computer accounts.
Teagueduino soldering party, continued. Discuss Assignment 6.
Teagueduino coding and soldering party.
Finish lab work for Assignment 6.
[a href='Assignment_06.xhtml']Assignment 6: Binary Counters[/a] due.
[a href='Assignment_07.xhtml']Assignment 7: [em]Human Human[/em] Chapters 0-3[/a] due. [br/]Agents: Rational and Intelligent; Decisions: Deterministic and Probabalistic
[a href='Assignment_08.xhtml']Assignment 8: Galton Board[/a] due.
[strong]Last Class Meeting[/strong] [br/](Makeup for class missed on November 1) [br/][a href='Final_Topics.pdf']Final Paper requirements and Final Exam Study Guide[/a] (Updated 12/18/2012)
[strong]Midterm Exam[/strong]
[strong]Final Exam[/strong][br/] 1:45 pm - 3:45 pm SB-141[br/] [a href='Assignment_MC.xhtml']Missed Class assignment[/a] due.
